Class Medicine

java.lang.Object
entity.EntityObject
entity.medicine.Medicine
public class Medicine extends EntityObject
The Medicine class represents a medicine entity with details such as ID, name, stock quantity, unit cost, dosage, and low stock threshold. It extends the EntityObject class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Medicine

      public Medicine()
      Default constructor for the Medicine class.

    • Medicine

      public Medicine(String id, String medicineName, int stockQuantity, double unitCost, double dosage, int lowStockThreshold)
      Constructs a Medicine object with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the medicine.
      medicineName - The name of the medicine.
      stockQuantity - The quantity of the medicine in stock.
      unitCost - The cost per unit of the medicine.
      dosage - The dosage of the medicine (in mg).
      lowStockThreshold - The low stock threshold for the medicine.

  • Method Details

    • restock

      public void restock(int quantity)
      Restocks the medicine by adding a specified quantity.
      Parameters:
      quantity - The quantity to add to the current stock.

    • checkAvailability

      public boolean checkAvailability()
      Checks if the medicine is available in stock.
      Returns:
      true if the stock quantity is greater than 0, false otherwise.

    • getId

      public String getId()
      Gets the unique ID of the medicine.
      Specified by:
      getId in class EntityObject
      Returns:
      The ID of the medicine.

    • setId

      public void setId(String id)
      Sets the unique ID of the medicine.
      Parameters:
      id - The new ID of the medicine.

    • setMedicineName

      public void setMedicineName(String medicineName)
      Sets the name of the medicine.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine.

    • getStockQuantity

      public int getStockQuantity()
      Gets the current stock quantity of the medicine.
      Returns:
      The current stock quantity.

    • setStockQuantity

      public void setStockQuantity(int stockQuantity)
      Sets the current stock quantity of the medicine.
      Parameters:
      stockQuantity - The new stock quantity.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the new stock quantity is negative.

    • getDosage

      public double getDosage()
      Gets the dosage of the medicine.
      Returns:
      The dosage of the medicine in mg.

    • setDosage

      public void setDosage(double dosage)
      Sets the dosage of the medicine.
      Parameters:
      dosage - The new dosage of the medicine in mg.

    • getLowStockThreshold

      public int getLowStockThreshold()
      Retrieves the low stock threshold for the medicine.
      Returns:
      The stock level at which the medicine is considered to have low stock.

    • setLowStockThreshold

      public void setLowStockThreshold(int newLevel)
      Sets the low stock threshold for the medicine. Ensures the threshold is not negative.
      Parameters:
      newLevel - The new low stock threshold for the medicine.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the new threshold is negative.

    • getMedicineName

      public String getMedicineName()
      Gets the name of the medicine.
      Returns:
      The name of the medicine.

    • incStock

      public void incStock(int value)
      Increases the stock quantity of the medicine.
      Parameters:
      value - The quantity to increase.

    • decStock

      public void decStock(int value)
      Decreases the stock quantity of the medicine.
      Parameters:
      value - The quantity to decrease.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the resulting stock quantity is negative.

    • getUnitCost

      public double getUnitCost()
      Gets the unit cost of the medicine.
      Returns:
      The cost per unit of the medicine.

    • setUnitCost

      public void setUnitCost(float unitCost)
      Sets the unit cost of the medicine.
      Parameters:
      unitCost - The new unit cost of the medicine.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Medicine object, including all its attributes. A warning is added if the stock is below the low stock threshold.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representation of the medicine.
